localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
At $7.69 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.5 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
7.69万亿美元，美联储资产负债表本周再创新高。

自2020年初以来，美联储的总资产已经增加了3.5万亿美元，他们承诺未来将以每月1200亿美元的速度继续购买债券。https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl。

7.69萬億美元，美聯儲資產負債表本週再創新高。

自2020年初以來，美聯儲的總資產已經增加了3.5萬億美元，他們承諾未來將以每月1200億美元的速度繼續購買債券。https://t.co/t9E12BQLjl。

previous.excerpt: genei is an AI-powered productivity tool that now enables users to automatically summarise webpages or PDFs as they browse.
previous.title: genei chrome extension - AI-generated summaries of webpages and PDFs as you browse 🚀

localize.description: genei是一款由人工智能驱动的生产力工具，现在用户可以在浏览网页或PDF时自动进行总结。
localize.tagline: 当您浏览🚀时，AI生成网页和PDF的摘要。

localize.description: genei是一款由人工智能驅動的生產力工具，現在用戶可以在瀏覽網頁或PDF時自動進行總結。
localize.tagline: 當您瀏覽🚀時，AI生成網頁和PDF的摘要。
